channel.title: Geospatial on Yet Another Geographer
channel.description: Recent content in Geospatial on Yet Another Geographer

item.title: Happy GeoHacking
item.description: I just got done teaching a short workshop on GIS in Python. Something may be odd to those of you who use FOSS packages to do GIS: I didn’t use any GeoPandas. This wasn’t a constraint I wanted. But, just getting pure pip-installable packages like Shapely and PySAL was difficult enough. The admins didn’t want to install one of the big scientific Python distributions and would only let something with minimal impact get used.
